mapper.select: SELECT inqury.* , u1.name as npcName, u2.name as coorName, u3.name as replyName, o.name as unitName FROM db_inquryinfo inqury LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 on u1.id = inqury.npcId LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 on u2.id = inqury.coordinateId LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 on u3.id = inqury.replyId LEFT JOIN sys_office o on o.id = inqury.unitId WHERE 1=1 and inqury.npcId = ${user_id} and inqury.level = ${level_code} ORDER BY subTime DESC limit ${offset},${size}
